ygData.subject: Re: I have no CC, can i play EQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: you cant even play 1 month wihout the cc =( ask a friend if you can use his/her cc and pay them the money. worked for me =) ... From: Taz Man
ygData.messageBody:
you cant even play 1 month wihout the cc =(

ask a friend if you can use his/her cc and pay them the money. worked for me
=)

----- Original Message -----
From: Taz Man <taz00man@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 11:26 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] I have no CC, can i play EQ?


> From: "Taz Man" <taz00man@...>
>
> I have no credit card, yet im getting the game in a few days.
>

> play for 1month and quit :( heh
